response.overview: It's often said that the modern gold rush won't be for minerals or materials, but rather for data. In their new ten minute short documentary "The Web Data Revolution," Bright Data, presents an energizing look at the way that today's Fortune 500 companies, academic institutions, small businesses, and even environmental and human rights advocacy rely on data solutions to access important public web data. Following four real-life people who have succeeded at capitalizing on the "data revolution," the film presents a bright future where web data is positively utilized to shift paradigms, revive economies, help the environment, solve crime, and foster competitive advantages.
response.tagline: This short documentary explores how public data is changing the way companies see, think and make decisions.
response.title: Web Data Revolution

results.name: The Web Data Revolution - Bright Data
